## Overview by Dr. Alex Kaizer

This overview gives a good introduction to the different types of adaptations that one might consider when designing a clinical trial, as well as some examples of trials that have implemented these adaptations.

{{< video https://youtu.be/_njFVqEYz7Q?si=bzlxeHJrpRff_Kir >}}
